connect: Connect to the internet to automatically upload

prerequisites.introduction: CellScan collects data for the purpose of scientific research concerning the characterization of cellular towers
prerequisites.data: Only device location and connected cell tower information, which do not contain personally identifiable information, will be collected.
prerequisites.explanation: For effective data collection, please grant/enable the following permissions/services.

gpsHint: To find a GPS signal, please place the device somewhere with a clear view of the sky

notifications.grant: Please grant / enable all permissions / services

progress: Data collection in progress. You may exit the app, but please do not deny/disable the required permissions/services.
